system.description: Magma coats the nearest surface to the Target for the duration (minimum 5-foot square), causing it to be Difficult Terrain that deals d6 first time a Being enters the Area on a Turn and when it ends its Turn in the Area.
system.effect: Magma coats the nearest surface to the Target for the duration (minimum 5-foot square), causing it to be Difficult Terrain that deals d6 first time a Being enters the Area on a Turn and when it ends its Turn in the Area.
